usage.cn: 我害怕，害怕每次长时间的“正在输入”，换来的都是一句：哦。呵呵。
usage.eng: I fear every lasting "typing" which finally brings me only"OK.=)

usage.cn: 如果有人足够强大到让你倒下，那你就让他看看，你也能自己站起来
usage.eng: If someone is strong enough to bring you down,show them you are strong enough to get up.

usage.cn: 每个人都注定要遇到那个特别的人。你要做的就是等待老天将他带到你的身边
usage.eng: There's somebody out there for everybody. You just have to wait for god to bring him into your life.

usage.cn: 生活中难免遭遇打击。但是，真正能把你击倒的是你的态度。
usage.eng: Life always has many things to bring you down. But, what can really bring you down is your attitude.
